items.sentence: I want to learn all the words on this list before July first.

I slept until noon, and then studied for the rest of the day.
The area around the melting ice cream was crawling with ants.
The severely injured man was dead on arrival at the hospital.
Tom dropped his spoon on the floor and asked for another one.
I won't be able to do that by myself. You'll need to help me.
The old houses were torn down to make room for a supermarket.
They were treating me so rudely that I suddenly just lost it.
At a rough estimate, I would say the job will take two weeks.
A foolish impulse made me say what I should have left unsaid.
The man did not so much as apologize for stepping on my foot.
We could have our tea in the garden, were it a little warmer.

I still remember when I came to this town for the first time.
I still remember when I came to this city for the first time.

More than a third of the world population lives near a coast.
